info.name: TTG Dark/Slim Reloaded

info.additionalInfo:
Work In Progress:
Changes will come daily, or when needed.

Removed signatures, they are all ugly.
Changed homepage to fit style.
Changed all other pages to fit theme.
Special of Premium Page.

Bugs:
